element.hint: Select the Alight Action for this call flow step
element.label: Action
element.name: action

element.hint: Describe what this step in the call flow does
element.label: Description
element.name: description

element.hint: The flow configures an Action. Select the Flow associated with the selected Action
element.label: Flow
element.name: flow

element.hint: Enter the Lex Intent that you want to assign to this step
element.label: Intent
element.name: intent

element.hint: Visual indication of the start of a call flow section. Visual only - has no effect on operation
element.label: Label
element.name: label

element.hint: If set, will jump to the Path entered after completing this step's Action
element.label: Next Path
element.name: next_path

element.hint: If entered, the call will be transferred to the Zone defined here
element.label: Next Path Zone
element.name: next_path_zone

element.hint: Defines the prior step in the call tree
element.label: Parent
element.name: parent

element.hint: Enter the Path that uniquely identifies this call flow step
element.label: Path
element.name: path

element.hint: Enter a Reason that reflects the reason the person called
element.label: Reason
element.name: reason

element.hint: Enter a Subreason to refine the caller's reason for calling
element.label: Subreason
element.name: subreason
